turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello I would like to start my order

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, what store are you looking to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am ordering a drink from Peet's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, what are you thinking of ordering?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Macchiato

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Excellent, just plain?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I want a carmel one

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I see, what size drink are you wanting?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Medium

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I see, and what city are you looking to order in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Charlotte, NC

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I understand, is there anything else you'd like to change with your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get it with soy milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That should be it, what is my total?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total will be sent to your account for you to check

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order will be ready, a message has been sent detailing your order and pick up time

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome
